parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace that you want to update.

parameters.name: UpdaterRequestId
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies the request and that allows failed UpdatePrivateDnsNamespace requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice. UpdaterRequestId can be any unique string (for example, a date/timestamp). This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: Updated properties for the private DNS namespace. Description (string) --- An updated description for the private DNS namespace. Properties (dict) --- Properties to be updated in the private DNS namespace. Updated DNS properties for the private DNS namespace. Updated fields for the Start of Authority (SOA) record for the hosted zone for the private DNS namespace. The updated time to live (TTL) for purposes of negative caching.

nested_params.name: Description
nested_params.description: An updated description for the private DNS namespace.

nested_params.name: Properties
nested_params.description: Properties to be updated in the private DNS namespace.

nested_params.name: DnsProperties
nested_params.description: Updated DNS properties for the private DNS namespace.

nested_params.name: SOA
nested_params.description: Updated fields for the Start of Authority (SOA) record for the hosted zone for the private DNS namespace.

nested_params.name: TTL
nested_params.description: The updated time to live (TTL) for purposes of negative caching.

nested_items.name: OperationId
nested_items.description: A value that you can use to determine whether the request completed successfully. To get the status of the operation, see GetOperation.
